content: This book assumes that the reader has no prior knowledge of programming in Java, or for that matter, any object-oriented programming language. Practical examples and exercises following each topic and module make it easy to understand the software development methodology.  If you are a complete beginner, we suggest that you move slowly through this book and complete each exercise at your own pace.
